tutorials.title: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components

tutorials.title: Introduction - Story of a hack
tutorials.description: Understand the architecture of this workshop and what it can do

tutorials.title: Lab: Oracle facing a Ransomeware attack
tutorials.description: In this lab you can see how to leverage Oracle DB Security solutions against a Ransomware attack

tutorials.title: Introduction - Database Vault
tutorials.description: In this lab you can see how to leverage Oracle Database Vault (DV)

tutorials.title: Lab: Database Vault
tutorials.description: In this lab you can see how to leverage Oracle Database Vault (DV)

tutorials.title: Introduction - Data Safe Fundamentals
tutorials.description: This lab provides information about the Oracle Data Safe workshop.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Access your environment
tutorials.description: Access and review your Sandbox environment.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Assess database configurations
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to assess database configurations in your Autonomous Database by using the Security Assessment feature in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Assess database users
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to assess database users in your Autonomous Database by using the User Assessment feature in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Discover sensitive data
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to discover sensitive data on your target database by using the Data Discovery feature in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Mask sensitive data
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to mask sensitive data on your target database by using the Data Masking feature in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Audit database activity
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to provision audit policies and alerts in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Create and enforce a SQL Firewall policy in Data Safe
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to use SQL Firewall in Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
